about_the_game: This DLC is free for all EA players and will be removed from shop after Early Access. The DLC will include some of the l later coming content like skins for free for all owners of the DLC.

name: Defense Clicker - Early Access Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista,7,8,8.1,10
  • Processor: Quadcore or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • OS *: Windows Vista,7,8,8.1,10
  • Processor: Quadcore or higher
